app.ganchyas

Class MessagingFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • app.ganchyas.MessagingFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class MessagingFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    Fragments that shows the users their conversations and allows the starting of new conversations
    Author:
    Paradox
